title: Series convergence from the Limit Comparison Test

content.question: If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><msub> <mi>b</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> <mo><</mo><msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCB@</annotation> </semantics> </math> for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaWGUbGaeyyzImRaaGymaaaa@3988@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> diverges, then <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>b</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> diverges

If <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>b</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> converges, then <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <msub> <mi>a</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msub> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> converges
